item.title: Wallflower - Lm [Album]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
I’ll do my best to change and create my own artwork

Cool. It’ll improve the amount of respect you get as a creative artist.

Fwiw, I make most of my artwork using free images available on sites like Unsplash.com.

Sometimes I use them as they come, sometimes I rework them extensively.
Either way, they’re fine to be used however we want – and don’t require you to credit the photographer.

 
A couple of threads here list other sources you could use…

Cover Art Copyright? Branding & Distribution
So it seems that everyone does it, but I was just wondering is it technically legal to take images from Google and use them for our cover art?
Designing your album art? Branding & Distribution
Hey Auxy artists! I’ve received quite a few questions about my album art and I wanted to share with you my go-to place: Canva.com! This is a very easy-to-use graphic design site with a simple interface and lots of versatile features that, with some time and effort, can really make your album art stand out! The program offers lots of tools and presets to get you started, but you can go the extra mile and do some advanced layering with your own uploads. If you’re not looking to spend the money …

Read full topic

item.title: Wallflower - Lm [Album]
item.dc:creator: Fuujiya
item.description:
That might have something to do with the first track which isn’t mine and just changed a few minors details but hey if it needs taken down it would be.
And yeah I used a image from reginald. I do understand that taking someone’s artwork is not cool so I’ll do my best to change and create my own artwork thanks for pointing this out I’m new to this type of stuff.

But other than that all the tracks were made by myself in auxy studio

Read full topic

item.title: Wallflower - Lm [Album]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Forgive me for pointing it out, but you seem to be taking your artwork from other musicians.

Artwork for this release seems related to a Paramore track and your avatar here is from Reginald Omas Mamode.

What gives?

Read full topic

item.title: Wallflower - Lm [Album]
item.dc:creator: tornait
item.description:
Holy crap, the design on these songs is out of this world. I’m just blown away.

Also, you cannot just go and start the album with a rendition of Fairy Fountain from LoZ. You’ve absolutely slayed me with this album from the intro.
